website_summaries.verdict: A luxury facial oil from a household name in skincare.
pros: Six key vitamins target signs of aging while boosting hydration
Brightens skin while defending it from free radicals for a more youthful-looking complexion
cons: Expensive compared to other facial oils

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it at night after I wash my face and use a toner. It smells great. When I wake up my skin feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mansell

customer_reviews.title: am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I happened across this product by accident, and, oh, boy, am I glad I did! I have mature skin in a dry climate. It's been perfect. The "oil" just melts into your skin. From the first minute, my skin felt softer! I would recommend it to anybody needing added moisture to their skin regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leave your skin oily!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely hooked on this product. I wouldn't normally spend so much on a product but this one is worth it. One bottle lasts me about 3-4 months with daily use. It's high quality and leaves my skin so soft and hydrated. It feels extremely healing and soothing to put this on. What I like most is that it does NOT leave my skin oily - it totally absorbs and I can put makeup on top of it without any problems. I’ve tried other facial oils that leave my skin oily and my makeup melting from it! I also looooove the scent ... it smells like a spa! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZumaLun

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. I have red blotches all yhe time, visible scars, acne, and big pores. This product has notably improved my skin with just a week of use. This doesn’t do mych for the dryness (i just ordered another moisurizing mask), but it does help a lot with texture and redness. Pores are smaller, redness going away. It’s also very light: only takes a drop or two to cover my whole face

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I bought it because my nostrils are often chapped from blowing my nose due to seasonal allergies. It took care of that problem and also cleared up other patches of dry skin. The scent is lovely and delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: I like this product I use it every morning under my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product I use it every morning under my B.B. cream... I think is an ok product don’t expect wow overnight difference on the skin, but worth give it a try. I may buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on your skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. It makes my skin feel really good. It is an oil, but doesn't stay oily feeling, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fife

customer_reviews.title: evens out my complexion
customer_reviews.text: makes my skin soft....seems to reduce fine lines and even out my complexion, which tends towards ruddy
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It feels great on my skin and seems to help keep my skin hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: marcia r. liuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a son that is an aesthetician and this is still one of my favorites! Goes in smooth and leaves skin feeling silky soft
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. It is a little pricey but it’s worth it! I have tried other products but they don’t compare or smell as good. It only takes a small drop. I won’t use anything else. It goes a long way. I use the Murad lip gloss as well and it’s amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just a couple drops is enough for my whole face. I use it everyday and it has really helped soften some lines around my eyes and on my forehead
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Great for redness
customer_reviews.text: I use Murad products and swear by them despite being pricey. You barely have to use any serum! Just a little dab in your hand. This bottle will probably last me for 3 months +
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ward

customer_reviews.title: Drink it in
customer_reviews.text: This product is oil but not oily and does not create blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Moistens and adds glow to dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for dull, dry skin to replenish moisture and promote a glowing complexion. I apply it after cleansing and then put sunscreen and liquid foundation over it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Not the same serum as Muard sells
customer_reviews.text: Serum is watery and smells like eucalyptus oil. It is not the same product that I got from Muard. I am returning this for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: melody sneden

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far . Use it day &night . leaves my face soft and has improved my skin
customer_reviews.author: nataliecleary

customer_reviews.title: wrinkles be gone replace with vibrancy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the oil for awhile - love it. Did discover while on vacation and got an oven burn that it makes a great emergency first aid - burns healed quickly. At age 75 my skin looks wonderful, wrinkle free and would recommend this to anyone and have done so.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Goes right into the skin and doesn't feel greasy or oily.
customer_reviews.text: Softens the skin and relaxes the wrinkles, gives a brightness to complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Walls

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks and feels better in weeks
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Gives great moisture to my skin and absorbs well.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination with daily moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love using this oil on my face daily. Although it is a bit on the pricey side, it is worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Makes skins soft and toned and helps with dark spots from acne. I used it to replace my everyday moisturiser. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina27

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product from Murad I have ever used. It definitely fix my dry skin. I use it every morning and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bless

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: ADORE THIS STUFF!!! I still have my old lady wrinkles...but do feel they are not as harsh
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product have been issuing it for years now works great with my skin
customer_reviews.author: EVELYN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for my face and really have good results.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy
customer_reviews.text: It disappears into my skin quickly and leaves it quite soft. Layering this oil with my other mural products doesn’t create any heaviness.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hrncir

customer_reviews.title: Not a dry oil - this is the real McCoy
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully this is a real oil. I love it. It absorbs quickly. I've tried many other brands and this one is best for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Carda

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I use many of the Murad product but this is my favorite. I use it as my first moisturizing step for my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended while I was getting a facial at Massage Envy. I've used the oil for a month now and noticed a difference in my skin tone and elasticity. I am 68 years old and noticed that a daily routine of cleanser, toner, oil, water gel and light makeup have made an amazing difference. I use the products in the AM and PM. It shows because people have asked what I am doing differently. Thank you Murad
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use the entire Murad Resurgence line, but just started using this as well. Instantly disappears into your skin, it's super light and whatever is in this product is spot on. I'm 57 years old and have purchased so many high-end products to maintain my skin. However, I always end up back with Murad and love this new addition to my regimen. It really does make your skin glow and people ask me all the time what skin care line I use. A+ Murad, keep up the great research!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Fenimore-Conner

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing
customer_reviews.text: I'm 19, I have an oily t-zone and very dry everywhere else. After two days of morning and night time use, my skin started glowing and it has stayed so radiant and healthy since. I have never had major problems with acne, usually break out with on or two zits when my time of the month comes. So far, nothing! If anything, the oil may have even aided in preventing. So excited that I found this product. Murad definitely won me over for good! I wish there was a serum similar to this for the body as well because it did wonders for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Kikoen

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? My skin was immediately happier after the very first use. My skin seems less reactive, much more moisturized, and much less dull. I love this stuff! For reference, i have really sensitive and reactive skin, very dry, with lots of sun damage.
customer_reviews.author: Telling it like it is

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to spend this much money again on a facial product. You will not be disappointed. My skin craves it now. I will not be without it. It is worth the money! You will see results.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A

customer_reviews.title: no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! I have oily skin so i was worried it would make my oily skin look worse but it improved it! I swear my skin looks smoother and healthier! Most I have ever spent on a face product and i love, love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah R Theisen

product_meta.title: Murad Multi-Vitamin Infusion Oil - Revolutionary Facial Oil Powered by Vitamins A-F – Multi-Vitamin Oil Targets Signs of Aging and Boosts Hydration, 1.0 Fl Oz
